mapper.insert: INSERT INTO match (match_no, member_id, match_city, match_location, match_date, match_time, match_age, match_size, match_status, team_no, opposing_no, match_board_no, team_type) values (#{matchNo}, #{memberId}, #{matchCity}, #{matchLocation}, #{matchDate}, #{matchTime}, #{matchAge}, #{matchSize}, '모집중', #{teamNo}, null, #{matchBoardNo}, 'HOME')
mapper.update: update match set match_city = #{matchCity}, match_location = #{matchLocation}, match_date = #{matchDate}, match_time = #{matchTime}, match_age = #{matchAge}, match_size = #{matchSize} where match_no = #{matchNo}
mapper.select: select * from match where instr(${column}, #{keyword}) > 0 order by ${column} asc
select team_no from team_member where member_id= #{memberId}
